input.sentences: some friends bought fireworks for their 4th of july party . they bought one in the shape of a yellow and green house ...
and one shaped as a panda .
the house firework exploded into a spray of green and yellow lights .
the panda started off as yellow fireworks ...
and then worked into a pink explosion . the friends believed that their purchases were well worth it .
output.sentences: The party favor was a house shape and had yellow walls.
There were picks in the cupcakdes shaped like pandas.
The yellow panda started to party.
The pink purchases were worth it.
